column1: Uchi////I go back and forth on whether this is a 4 or 5 star. This place is really a 4.5 in my book. I've been here many times and consistently have had a GOOD meal. It has not consistently been AMAZING. I've ordered omasake twice here
column2: and both times have left still pretty hungry. The sushi and sashimi are phenomenal
column4: and innovative. I wish that their portion sizes were a little bigger.
